front.title: Defined-Trust Transport (DeftT) Protocol for Limited Domains

abstract.t: This document describes a broadcast-friendly, many-to-many Defined- trust Transport (DeftT) that makes it simple to express and enforce application and deployment specific integrity, authentication, access control and behavior constraints directly in the protocol stack. DeftT combined with IPv6 multicast and modern hardware-based methods for securing keys and code provides an easy to use foundation for secure and efficient communications in Limited Domains (RFC8799), in particular for Operational Technology (OT) networks.
